name: FF Digdogger
author: Alucard648
info: Digdogger variant with exended coustomizability. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: Walks around, shooting eweapons. Play whistle, when eye is open to damage this monster.
setup: 1. Set up 2 enemies, 1 for eye and 1 invincible for body Digdogger`s eye anmimation is handled by code and uses 4 frames, animation should be set to "none". 2.Assign atttributes for eye part of boss.Attribute 1: ID of enemy to spawn on deathAttribute 2: Delay between opening and closing eyeAttribute 3: Delay between shots, in frames. Enemy won`t fire , if Weapon Damage is 0. -1 - shoot eweapons on opening eye. Attribute 4: Delay between single eweapons in one volley, in frames.Attribute 5: Number of eweapons to fire per burstAttribute 6: ID of enemy used by bodyAttribute 7: Eweapon sprite Attribute 8: Tile Width of bodyAttribute 9: Tile Height of bodyAttribute 10: Number of enemies to spawn on death
